name: My Trip to Asia
description:
My Trip to Asia is a a choice-based visual novel made in Ren’Py and the first in many I hope to create.

My Trip to Asia - Synopsis

A young man, after spending his all life in same place, going to Japan for the first time.
In this adventure, which will get rid of his boring life and find interesting adventure and meet attractive Asian girls, it will sometimes save the day and become a hero and sometimes get in to trouble.

Because of the first episode was the introduction part, it was a short adventure. However, I would like to develop longer and different dynamics in the upcoming episodes. In the progress of the story, you will meet different characters and experience different events.
